qas.question: The author, Ian Fleming, created a fictional character named James Bond who prefers to only read what newspaper?
What is the name of the spy and hero in Ian Fleming's books?
In what Ian Fleming novel is James Bond described as only reading The Times newspaper?

context: In the James Bond series by Ian Fleming, <a1_0>James Bond<a1_0/>, reads The Times. As described by Fleming in <a2_0>From Russia, with Love<a2_0/>: "<a0_0>The Times<a0_0/> was the only paper that Bond ever read."
